title: Hackney Half-term Adventure
description: Hackney Half-term Adventure describes the adventures of boys on school holiday. When a simple shopping task goes awry, the boys are whisked across town in search of odd jobs to come up with money to buy groceries. Their adventures take them to parks, a car shop, and eventually to the supermarket with an English soccer player in tow. The text is accompanied by black and white photographs.
creator: Ken Worpole and John Boler
subject: Youth; Community; Family; Centerprise; London
